## Description

Brief description of the change.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] New benchmark results
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Formula correction or refinement

## Coherence Check

- [ ] The benchmark engine still produces correct output
- [ ] State classifications remain accurate for all test cases
- [ ] No external dependencies were introduced
- [ ] All processing remains local (nothing transmitted)

## Design Principles Respected

- [ ] Prescriptive, not coercive
- [ ] Python 3.6+ compatible
- [ ] Zero external dependencies
- [ ] CC BY-SA 4.0 compatible
- [ ] Honest about limitations

Any context that helps reviewers understand this change.
